author: wrowe
msg: Introduce EPSV command handling (EPSV, ESPV ALL, EPSV 1, EPSV 2).
EPSV ALL creates a contract we must enforce for any subsequent
PASV/PORT/EPRT request, for the lifetime of the control connection.

author: wrowe
msg: sscanf ensures we really wasted our time dup'ing arg.

author: omalley
msg: HADOOP-1970.  Fix deadlock in reporting progress. (Vivek Ratan via omalley)

author: mharwood
msg: Added new DuplicateFilter functionality to filter documents sharing a field value (e.g. primary key/url)
Also includes Junit test and XML Query support
